pageContext.description: Blade edges damaged, only preserved at one point. Socket in good condition.
pageContext.surface: Red stains as iron on blade. Small hole in socket.
pageContext.other: Width: blade 22mm; socket 20mm,Thickness: blade 8mm; socket 21mm,Weight: 85.05 gms
pageContext.associations: Found with 3 palstaves, 4 s. celts, 4 Roman coins, a tongue-shaped object of bronze, a bronze needle, numerous pins and small objects and several medieval items.
pageContext.collection: Private Collection,1923,Lady Stanier, The Citadel (no. 8),Preston Brockhurst (Shropshire),Purchased by the late Sir Beville Stanier, from 2nd and 3rd Viscounts Hill
